turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how may i assist you today?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is anyone there?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order I would like to order an espresso from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, just one shot of espresso.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like the I would like the black and white mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size did you want that drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A venti.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and did you want that iced or hot?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Iced, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. and did you have a preference on what type of milk is used?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like soy milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you got it. anything else for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to add whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so to confirm before i place your order, you'd like a venti iced black and white mocha with soy milk and whipped cream from starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. That is right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: cool, and which starbucks did you want to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one near the University of Houston.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you got it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the total for your order will be $4.50.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to purchase now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: cool. Your drink will be ready at the Starbucks near the university of houston in 7 minutes. Enjoy!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.
